Unique attribute identifying a valid instance of One-Time Payment Plan.

validation.validation: The one-time payment plan name provided has already been used.
validation.description: This validation ensures that the one-time payment plan name provided is unique when creating or editing a one-time payment plan.  The false condition requires that no existing names (including names in the future) match the incoming name from the parameters.  The true conditions allow one to edit an existing one-time payment plan retaining the same name.

validation.validation: A unique Plan Name must be provided when creating a new One-Time Payment Plan.
validation.description: This validation ensures that Plan Name is provided when creating a new One-Time Payment Plan.  When updating an existing One-Time Payment Plan, Plan Name is not required.
